bills on abortion funding this week, Senate Democrats on Tuesday took aim at the GOP proposals as "extreme" and charged that they are a distraction from Congress's top priority of kick-starting the economy. We're here today to send a clear message to our Republican colleagues on the House Judiciary Committee side: Your agenda on women's health is extreme. It breaks faith with a decades-long bipartisan compromise. And according to medical experts, your agenda risks the health and the lives of women, Barbara Boxer ( D-Calif.) said at a Capitol news conference. "The Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act would deny any family planning funds under title X from going to Planned Parenthood or other organizations that perform abortions," said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor.
